name: open-wiki-edit-page
title: open-wiki-edit-page
author: Brett Zamir
description:
Context menu item to translate Mediawiki-style links (as used at Wikipedia) into corresponding edit links (i.e., from /wiki/title or title(title) links into ?actionedit&title(title) links. Only appears when right-clicking such qualifying links.

There are also now Open ISBN at Amazon links which only appear when right-clicking Special:BookSources/ISBN links. These links will allow a direct visit to the Amazon.com search result page for that ISBN (e.g., when an interesting book is found on Wikipedia).
